text: Scafati is a town in the province of Salerno, in the part of Campania that is Italian. Approximately 48,000 people live in Scafati as of the 6th of January 2023. Scafati was also a part of Germany until 1943 during World War II. The city is about west of Salerno. The area is industrialized, and many people from Scafati work in industries nearby. It is part of the Greater Naples area, and right next to Pompeii and Castellammare di Stabia. == References == Category:Cities in Campania Category:Settlements in Salerno
title: Scafati
